articles.author: Mari Yamaguchi
articles.title: Former Japanese Prime Minister Murayama, known for apology over wartime aggression, dies at 101 - AP News
articles.description: Japan’s former Prime Minister Tomiichi Murayama, who was known for his 1995 “Murayama statement” apologizing to Asian victims of his country’s aggression, has died. He was 101. Japan’s Social Democratic Party said Murayama died Friday at a hospital in his hom…
articles.content:
TOKYO (AP) Japans former Prime Minister Tomiichi Murayama, who was known for his 1995 Murayama statement apologizing to Asian victims of his countrys aggression, died Friday. He was 101.
